name: Tortoise
special_abilities: PLACE FACE DOWN UNDER ONE OF YOUR FACE DOWN DRAGONS.  THE DRAGON GAINS +1 STRENGTH WHEN DEFENDING AS LONG AS THE TORTOISE IS ON THE DRAGON.  CAN'T USE ON FLYERS OR SUBTERRANEAN DRAGONS.
lore: In Chinese mythology, the Tortoise could not be killed by Dragons and could not kill Dragons.
